description: Contains a list of Regular expressions based on the provided inputs. RegexPatternSet can be used with other WAF entities with RegexPatternSetReferenceStatement to perform other actions .

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
ARN of the WAF entity.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Description.markdownDescription:
Description of the entity.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9=:#@/\-,.][a-zA-Z0-9+=:#@/\-,.\s]+[a-zA-Z0-9+=:#@/\-,.]{1,256}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
Name of the RegexPatternSet.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9A-Za-z_-]{1,128}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Id.markdownDescription:
Id of the RegexPatternSet

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-(?:[0-9a-f]{4}-){3}[0-9a-f]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

RegularExpressionList.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Scope.description: Use CLOUDFRONT for CloudFront RegexPatternSet, use REGIONAL for Application Load Balancer and API Gateway.
Scope.markdownDescription:
Use CLOUDFRONT for CloudFront RegexPatternSet, use REGIONAL for Application Load Balancer and API Gateway.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CLOUDFRONT | REGIONAL  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
ARN of the WAF entity.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Id.markdownDescription:
Id of the RegexPatternSet

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-(?:[0-9a-f]{4}-){3}[0-9a-f]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes
